Attributes.description: Digital representation of curves and surfaces, including splines, subdivision surfaces and meshes. Principles, algorithms and mathematical foundations for geometry representation in computer graphics, computer vision, fabrication, CAD/CAM, and medical imaging. Algorithms for acquisition, creation, representation, and processing of 3D shapes.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: CPSC 320 and one of MATH 152, MATH 221, MATH 223 and one of MATH 200, MATH 217, MATH 226, MATH 253.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Mon Wed Fri, Start Time: 12:00, End Time: 13:00, Building: To, Room: Be
